info.author: Peter Zagubisalo
info.description:
Pandoctools
===========

**Pandoctools is not finished yet!**

Pandoctools is a collection of filters and interfaces for convenient
Pandoc workflow. Including:

1. `Installation
   instructions <https://github.com/kiwi0fruit/pandoctools/blob/master/install.md>`__
   for Pandoctools and Atom editor markdown.
2. `Knitty <https://github.com/kiwi0fruit/pandoctools/blob/master/knitty.md>`__:
   Insert python code (or other Jupyter kernel code) to the document and
   have code’s results in the output document. Interface wrapper for
   modified Knotr/Stitch by Tom Augspurger is included in Pandoctools.
   `Original version <https://github.com/pystitch/stitch>`__.
3. `SugarTeX <https://github.com/kiwi0fruit/pandoctools/blob/master/sugartex.md>`__:
   more readable LaTeX language extension and transcompiler to LaTeX (by
   Peter Zagubisalo).
4. `Filters pipes shell
   scripts <https://github.com/kiwi0fruit/pandoctools/blob/master/shell_scripts.md>`__
   (bash/batch) as interface to Panflute Pandoc filters and python text
   filters. Users write a shell script that specifies filters and Pandoc
   options. Then they use it to convert the particular document or to
   convert any document of choise in the same manner.
5. `API <https://github.com/kiwi0fruit/pandoctools/blob/master/api.md>`__
   of Pandoctools python module.
6. `Tips <https://github.com/kiwi0fruit/pandoctools/blob/master/tips.md>`__
   about using Pandoc, Knotr, Hydrogen, useful Atom editor packages,
   installing R, etc.
info.name: pandoctools
info.summary: Pandoc profile manager (stores any CLI filter pipelines), CLI wrapper for Panflute, other helpers.
